00064 
00065 float OmniDriveTrajectoryGenerator::getShortestAngle(float goalAngle, float actualAngle) {
00066     return atan2(sin(goalAngle - actualAngle), cos(goalAngle - actualAngle));
00067 }
00068 
00069 void OmniDriveTrajectoryGenerator::computePathComposite(const std::vector<FrameWithId>& path, KDL::Path_Composite& pathComposite) {
00070     std::vector<FrameWithId>::const_iterator it;
00071 
00072     if (path.size() > 1) {
00073 
00074         FrameWithId p1 = path.front();
00075         FrameWithId p2;
00076 
00077         for (it = path.begin() + 1; it != path.end(); ++it) {
00078             p2 = *it;
00079             KDL::Frame f1, f2;
00080             f1 = p1.getFrame();
00081             f2 = p2.getFrame();
00082 
00083             KDL::RotationalInterpolation_SingleAxis* rot = new KDL::RotationalInterpolation_SingleAxis();
00084             //   rot->Vel(0.1,0.01);
00085             //   rot->Acc(0.1,0.01,0.001);
00086             KDL::Path_Line* pathLine = new KDL::Path_Line(f1, f2, rot, 0.001);
00087             pathComposite.Add(pathLine);
00088 
00089             p1 = p2;
00090         }
00091 
00092     }
00093 }
00094 
00095 void OmniDriveTrajectoryGenerator::interpolateRotation(const std::vector<FrameWithId>& path, std::vector<FrameWithId>& pathWithRotation) {
00096 
00097     if (path.size() <= 1)
00098         return;
00099 
00100     pathWithRotation.clear();
00101 
00102     double r, p, y;
00103     path.front().getFrame().M.GetRPY(r, p, y);
00104     double start = y;
00105 
00106     path.back().getFrame().M.GetRPY(r, p, y);
00107     double end = y;
00108     double step = getShortestAngle(end, start) / (path.size() - 1);
00109 
00110 
00111     std::vector<FrameWithId>::const_iterator it;
00112     for (it = path.begin(); it != path.end(); ++it) {
00113 
00114         KDL::Frame f;
00115         std::string id = it->id;
00116 
00117         f.p = it->getFrame().p;
00118         f.M = KDL::Rotation::RPY(0, 0, start);
00119 
00120         pathWithRotation.push_back(FrameWithId(f, id));
00121 
00122         start = start + step;
00123     }
00124 
00125     // pathWithRotation.front() = path.front();
00126     // pathWithRotation.back() = path.back();
00127 }
00128 
00129 void OmniDriveTrajectoryGenerator::computeTrajectroy(const KDL::Path_Composite& path, KDL::Trajectory_Composite& trajectory) {
00130 
00131     const double maxVel = 1.0;
00132     const double maxAcc = 0.1;
00133 
00134     KDL::VelocityProfile_Trap* velocityProfile = new KDL::VelocityProfile_Trap(maxVel, maxAcc);
00135     KDL::Path* copyPath = const_cast<KDL::Path_Composite&> (path).Clone(); // Why KDL has no const version of Clone method?
00136     // They force me to do this!
00137 
00138     velocityProfile->SetProfile(0, copyPath->PathLength());
00139 
00140     KDL::Trajectory_Segment* trajectorySegment = new KDL::Trajectory_Segment(copyPath, velocityProfile);
00141     trajectory.Add(trajectorySegment);
00142 
00143 }
00144 
00145 void OmniDriveTrajectoryGenerator::computeTrajectroy(const std::vector<FrameWithId> path, KDL::Trajectory_Composite& trajectory) {
00146     std::vector<FrameWithId> pathWithRotation;
00147     interpolateRotation(path, pathWithRotation);
00148 
00149     KDL::Path_Composite pathComposite;
00150     computePathComposite(pathWithRotation, pathComposite);
00151     computeTrajectroy(pathComposite, trajectory);
00152 }
